subject: Mounting Plus X P3-H3 directly in aluminum profile rig
description_text:
Hello,

I am pretty sure I can mount the pedals I just bought (Simsonn Plus X)
directly in my aluminum profile sim rig. Will I have the appropriate
screws/accessories to appropriately tie the pedals to the extrusion profile
rig?

Here is how the pedal tray is built :
[image: image.png]

Thank you for your help

conversations.body_text: Hi Simon Jolicoeur,    Our pedals can be directly mounted onto your 4080 profile. We include mounting screws and sliders with the product. You can also add a note in your order requesting “M6 sliders included” to ensure we prepare them for you—just kindly remind us.

Hi, that is great to hear! My order from AliExpress has already been
shipped, so hopefully it includes the sliders. Thanks a lot for your time!
